name: fabianwennink/iconcaptcha
description: IconCaptcha is a self-hosted, customizable, easy-to-implement and user-friendly captcha.

suggest.ext-gd: Required if you wish to use the GD image generator.
suggest.ext-imagick: Required if you wish to use the ImageMagick image generator.
suggest.ext-pdo: Required if you wish to use the default PDOSession class.
